notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: F.W.d.T. is member of the Directory Board of the Buchinger Wilhelmi Clinic where the study was performed. Amplius GmbH is a company that conceives, coordinates and develops fasting research. A.M. is a consultant at Buchinger Wilhelmi Clinic and receives financial compensation for this role from Amplius GmbH. This does not alter the authorsâ€™ adherence to Nutrients policies on sharing data and materials. S.D., T.N., T.L., F.G. and N.S. have no conflicts to declare.
